entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
